snippet: John Isner had seven aces and won the battle of big serves with a victory over Nicolas Almágro in the final of the U.S. Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston.
abstract: John Isner defeats Nicolas Almagro in singles final of US Men’s Clay Court Championship tennis tournament in Houston.
lead_paragraph: John Isner had seven aces and won the battle of big serves with a victory over Nicolas Almágro in the final of the U.S. Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston.

headline.seo: John Isner Wins U.S. Men’s Clay Court Championship
headline.main: Isner Wins U.S. Men’s Clay Court Championship
headline.print_headline: First Title of Year for Isner
